ygData.subject: GM Event on Tunare
ygData.msgSnippet: The one we had was on Xmas Eve, there may have been more than one, Modazil (yes, Modazil) spawned in Iceland conned yellow to 59 hit for about 160 he didn t
ygData.messageBody:
The one we had was on Xmas Eve, there may have been more than one, Modazil
(yes, Modazil) spawned in Iceland conned yellow to 59 hit for about 160 he
didn't say anything just attacked anyone that got near him. Was not too
hard and obviously controlled by a person as you could beat on him from
behind and just continue to strafe in the same direction he would try and
turn. Before he died a bunch of people showed up and like all GM loot it
went free loot when he died and not sure who got to loot it but he dropped
Turtle Belt and 2 swords, no stats.

Mu
